commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: Mancheng County's investment policy preferences, relaxed environment.
sentences.chinese: 满城县的招商引资政策优惠，环境宽松。

sentences.english: More investment-funded enterprises opened a new side.
sentences.chinese: 更为内资企业招商引资启开了新的一面。

sentences.english: In terms of tax, the investors will enjoy all the Weixian preferential policies for business invitation.
sentences.chinese: 在税费征收上，执行威县招商引资的各项优惠政策。

sentences.english: It belongs to a Trade and Investment Promotion Corporation in GaoGang District.
sentences.chinese: 是一家属于高港区招商引资企业。

sentences.english: Assist the Vice Mayor Zhang Guowei in his work to attract investment.
sentences.chinese: 协助张国伟同志负责招商引资工作。

sentences.english: Article 1 Award for investment promotion and capital attraction introducers ;
sentences.chinese: 第一条招商引资引荐人奖。

definition: to seek investment or funding/investment promotion
administrative committee/management committee/abbr. for 管理委員會|管理委员会[guan3 li3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]
